actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide funding for State medicaid fraud and abuse control and prevention units.

summary.text: Amends Title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to pay a specified percentage of each State's costs attributable to the establishment and operation of a State medicaid fraud and abuse control and prevention unit.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide funding for State medicaid fraud and abuse control and prevention units.
